# Calculs binaires

## Additions


1. 1101 + 10 =
2. 101001 + 101 =
3. 10101010 + 1011 =
4. 1011111 + 1 =
5. 10110101 + 10101 =
6. 11101010 + 10101 =
7. 1010 + 101 + 10 =
8. 11001 + 101 + 11 =
9. 101101 + 10010 + 110 =
10. 1101011 + 10111 + 101 =

## Soustractions


 1010110 - 101011 =
 1100101 - 110001 = 
 1010111 - 100000 =
 1010001 - 101010 = 
 1011100 - 101010 =
 1001101 - 100111 =
 1101000 - 101001 = 
 1011001 - 101111 =
